verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
If one <S%H5254>assay<s%> to <S%H1697>commune<s%> with <S%H3811>thee<s%>, wilt thou be grieved? But who <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H6113>withhold<s%> himself from <S%H4405>speaking<s%>?
Behold <S%H3256><s%>, thou hast instructed <S%H7227>many<s%>, And thou hast <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H7504>weak<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
Thy <S%H4405>words<s%> have <S%H6965>upholden<s%> him that was <S%H3782>falling<s%>, And thou hast made <S%H553>firm<s%> the <S%H3766>feeble<s%> <S%H1290>knees<s%>.
But now it is <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H3811>thee<s%>, and thou faintest; It <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H926>thee<s%>, and thou art troubled.
Is not thy <S%H3374>fear<s%> of God thy <S%H3690>confidence<s%>, And the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> thy <S%H8615>hope<s%>?
Remember <S%H2142><s%>, I pray <S%H6>thee<s%>, who ever perished, being <S%H5355>innocent<s%>? Or <S%H375>where<s%> were the <S%H3477>upright<s%> cut <S%H3582>off<s%>?
According as I have <S%H7200>seen<s%>, they that <S%H2790>plow<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, And <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H5999>trouble<s%>, reap the <S%H7114>same<s%>.
By the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> they <S%H6>perish<s%>, And by the <S%H7307>blast<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%> are they <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.
The <S%H7581>roaring<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the fierce <S%H7826>lion<s%>, And the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions<s%>, are <S%H5421>broken<s%>.
The old <S%H3918>lion<s%> <S%H6>perisheth<s%> for <S%H1097>lack<s%> of <S%H2964>prey<s%>, And the <S%H1121>whelps<s%> of the <S%H3833>lioness<s%> are scattered <S%H6504>abroad<s%>.
Now a <S%H1697>thing<s%> was secretly <S%H1589>brought<s%> to <S%H241>me<s%>, And mine ear <S%H3947>received<s%> a whisper <S%H8102>thereof<s%>.
In <S%H5587>thoughts<s%> from the <S%H2384>visions<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>, When deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%> on <S%H582>men<s%>,
Fear <S%H6343><s%> <S%H7122>came<s%> upon <S%H7461>me<s%>, and trembling, Which made <S%H7230>all<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> to <S%H6342>shake<s%>.
Then a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H2498>passed<s%> before my <S%H6440>face<s%>; The <S%H8185>hair<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> stood <S%H5568>up<s%>.

It stood <S%H5975>still<s%>, but I could not <S%H5234>discern<s%> the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> <S%H4758>thereof<s%>; A form was before mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: There was <S%H1827>silence<s%>, and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%>, saying,
Shall mortal <S%H582>man<s%> be more <S%H6663>just<s%> than <S%H433>God<s%>? Shall a <S%H1397>man<s%> be more <S%H2891>pure<s%> than his <S%H6213>Maker<s%>?
Behold <S%H539><s%>, he putteth no trust in his <S%H5650>servants<s%>; And his <S%H4397>angels<s%> he <S%H7760>chargeth<s%> with <S%H8417>folly<s%>:

How much <S%H637>more<s%> them that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H2563>clay<s%>, Whose <S%H3247>foundation<s%> is in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, Who are <S%H1792>crushed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6211>moth<s%>!
Betwixt <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening<s%> they are <S%H3807>destroyed<s%>: They <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%> without any regarding <S%H7760>it<s%>.
Is not their <S%H3499>tent-cord<s%> <S%H5265>plucked<s%> up within <S%H4191>them<s%>? They die, and that without <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
